snippet: The former chief executive of the Walt Disney Company on Tuesday said his seven-year-old company, Tornante, would produce an unspecified number of films to be sold globally by Universal Pictures.
abstract: The former chief executive of the Walt Disney Company on Tuesday said his seven-year-old company, Tornante, would produce an unspecified number of films to be sold globally by Universal Pictures.

headline.main: Michael Eisner Announces a Film Deal With Universal
